key.name: file-encodings-shown-in-menu
key.description: List of encodings shown in the File Open/Save dialogs.

key.name: file-open-encoding-option
key.description: Encoding option to use by default when opening files. Possible values are: "AutoDetect" to use auto detection, "RememberLastUsed" to remember the last used encoding, "CurrentLocale" to use the current locale, and "Specific" to use a specific encoding. The encoding for "RememberLastUsed" and "Specific" is stored in the file_open_encoding key.

key.name: file-open-encoding
key.description: Encoding to use when opening files. Besides the actual encoding, used when "RememberLastUsed" or "Specific" are set in the file_open_encoding_option key, other possible values are "AutoDetect" and "CurrentLocale".

key.name: file-open-fallback
key.description: Encoding to use when auto detection fails.

key.name: file-save-encoding-option
key.description: Encoding option to use by default when saving files. Possible values are: "KeepExisting" to use the existing file's encoding, "RememberLastUsed" to remember the last used encoding, "CurrentLocale" to use the current locale, and "Specific" to use a specific encoding. The encoding for "RememberLastUsed" and "Specific" is stored in the file_save_encoding key.

key.name: file-save-encoding
key.description: Encoding to use when saving files. Besides the actual encoding, used when "RememberLastUsed" or "Specific" are set in the file_save_encoding_option key, other possible values are "KeepExisting" and "CurrentLocale".

key.name: file-save-format-option
key.description: Subtitle format option to use by default when saving files. Possible values are: "KeepExisting" to use the existing file's format, "RememberLastUsed" to remember the last used format, and "Specific" to use a specific format. The subtitle format for "RememberLastUsed" and "Specific" is stored in the file_save_format key.

key.name: file-save-format
key.description: Subtitle format to use when saving files. Besides the actual format, used when "RememberLastUsed" or "Specific" are set in the file_save_format_option key, other possible values are "KeepExisting" and "CurrentLocale".

key.name: file-save-newline-option
key.description: Newline option to use by default when saving files. Possible values are: "RememberLastUsed" to remember the last used newline type, and "Specific" to use a specific newline type. The newline type for "RememberLastUsed" and "Specific" is stored in the file_save_newline key.

key.name: file-save-newline
key.description: Newline type to use when saving files.

key.name: file-translation-save-all
key.description: Whether to save existing translations when saving subtitles.

key.name: video-auto-choose-file
key.description: Whether to automatically choose the video file to open, when opening a subtitle file. A video file is chosen based on the name of the subtitle file.

key.name: video-apply-reaction-delay
key.description: Whether to apply a reaction delay when setting the start or end times of a subtitle with the video playing.

key.name: video-reaction-delay
key.description: Time, in milliseconds, to subtract from the start or end times when setting them with the video playing.

key.name: video-seek-on-change
key.summary: Seek the video on subtitles change
key.description: Whether to seek the video to the start of the first subtitle when one or more subtitles are changed.

key.name: video-seek-on-change-rewind
key.description: Time, in milliseconds, to rewind the video when seeking on subtitles change.

key.name: view-line-lengths
key.description: Whether to view line lengths as characters counts in the subtitle list.

key.name: view-window-width
key.description: The width of the Main Window.

key.name: view-window-height
key.description: The height of the Main Window.

key.name: spellcheck-text-language
key.description: The language used to check the spelling of subtitle text.

key.name: spellcheck-translation-language
key.description: The language used to check the spelling of subtitle translation.

key.name: spellcheck-auto
key.description: Whether to automatically check the spelling of subtitle text.

key.name: backup-auto
key.description: Whether to automatically backup files. A copy of the file will be periodically saved with a ~ suffix.

key.name: backup-time
key.description: Time interval, in seconds, to automatically backup files. A minimum of 30 seconds is recommended.

key.name: timings-time-step
key.description: Time, in milliseconds, to add or subtract when adjusting times in spinbutton controls (e.g., start, end and duration).

key.name: timings-frames-step
key.description: Frames to add or subtract when adjusting frames in spinbutton controls (e.g., start, end and duration).

key.name: timings-time-between-subs
key.description: Recommended time between subtitles, in milliseconds, used for example when splitting a subtitle in two.
